t: Amazon Basics Ergotron-type Monitor Mount Rocks!
s: The black is a smooth, matte finish with a nice looking "Amazon Basics" logo. Absolutely love it! (Admittedly it's only been a day). The design is suspiciously similar to the Ergotron LX including the mounting base, so I wouldn't be surprised if this is the Amazon Basics brand of the same product.
